name: UltiMage - The Finite Dungeon
description:
Be the Magician that you always dreamed of!

In Ultimage: The Finite Dungeon you take control of one of the most powerful mages in the realm that was sent to put an end in the reign that a necromancer started in a once peaceful valley

Latest Devlog Video UltiMage is in ACTIVE DEVELOPMENT 

Not as fast as I would like =/

STATUS: EARLY-PRE-ALPHA

The build available is literally the first build result of the development shown in the Devlog 00, you can download it, but keep in mind that only basic movement is implemented in this build.
